named-query.name: Member.findMemberById
named-query.query: select m from MemberMaster m where m.memberID=:id

named-query.name: Member.findMemberByEmail
named-query.query: select m from MemberMaster m where m.emailaddress =:email

named-query.name: Member.updateMemberStatus
named-query.query: update MemberMaster m set m.memberStatus=:status ,m.updateDate=now() where m.mmid =:memId

named-query.name: MemberAccount.updateNoOfFailedAttempt
named-query.query: update MemberAccount m set m.noOfFailAttem=:noOffailedAttempts ,m.lastUpdateDate=now() where m.memberID =:memId

named-query.name: MemberAccount.updateSucessLogin
named-query.query: update MemberAccount m set m.noOfFailAttem=0 ,m.lastUpdateDate=now(), m.lastLogin=now() where m.memberID =:memId

named-query.name: MemberMaster.readBasicProfile
named-query.query: select distinct m from MemberMaster m join fetch m.membershipTypeXs s where m.memberID=:memberID and CURRENT_DATE between s.startDate and s.expiryDate order by s.expiryDate
